sentence.Network_en: His bluster sank to sullenness under her look.
sentence.Network_cn: 在她目光逼视下,他蛮横的表情稍加收敛,显出一副阴沉的样子.

list.abs: he deeply knew that the individual life was frail and powerless at the moment of birth a sullen character in his college , longing for mental liberation .他深知个体生命在出生时的脆弱无奈，而在大学时性格忧郁，渴望精神上的自由解放。
